title: Bioactivity of biogenic silver/silver chloride nanoparticles from Maranta arundinacea rhizome extract: Antibacterial and antioxidant properties with anticancer potential against Ehrlich ascites carcinoma and human breast cancer cell lines
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Md. Ruhul-Amin, Md. Abdur Rahman, Nisa Khatun, Imtiaj Hasan, Syed Rashel Kabir, A.K.M. Asaduzzaman
